fixes.name: Delta Down USD 10Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 10Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level multiplication ([Delta Down T USD 10Y] * [Date Sign]) into an equivalent DAX calculated column using fully qualified table-column references. Both referenced fields are row-level calculated fields, so the result is implemented as a calculated column.
